comment: The dimension theorem for vector spaces: any two bases of the same vector space are equinumerous. Proven by using ~ lssacsex and ~ lbsacsbs to show that being a basis for a vector space is equivalent to being a basis for the associated algebraic closure system, and then using ~ acsexdimd . (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
